Introduction

Hirota Riki Maus, known under his stage name Maki, is a German-Japanese singer and dancer under HYBE Labels Japan. He is best known as the maknae of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.

In 2022, Maki participated in the survival show "&AUDITION - The Howling -" where he qualified to become a member of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.
